Air Purifier with SpaceTech Technology

Pollutants can build up inside your home. But you can't always see them.

Air Purifier with SpaceTech Technology

Pollutants can build up inside your home. But you can't always see them.

Removes up to 99.97% of 0.3㎛ sized dust

Meditate Air Purifier uses a powerful photo-chemical process developed in-house inspired from NASA technology.

The HEPA filter traps smallest of the things

The high grade HEPA and carbon filter enables the process in elminating unwanted things and lets you breathe clean air.

This process enables in eliminating dust particles, VOC & harmful gases and, bio aerosol & micro-organisms

Breathe clean air. Pure, fast & wide.

Harmoniously stylish design

Wooden finish base to give a ultra premium look and feel, so it blends harmoniously with modern interiors.

Easy and intuitive maintenance

The HEPA filter is easy to change and only needs periodic cleaning and they can be easily replaced.

Enjoy fresh air anywhere with AQI Monitor

This monitor can be carried anywhere and placed close to the user. The monitor is aware of the condition around the user and can adjust the air quality of the air purifier by adjusting its fan speed.

Performance and Design

Control AQI monitor remotely with real data, real time

Active Mode

Precise monitoring, intuitive display

The device displays the AQI using the LED indicator, the display is off to save the battery when not in use.

Sleep Mode

Purification that's quiet as a whisper

It saves your effort and reduces energy use and, also helps you sleep by creating a quieter air flow, without display lighting.

Explore Mode

Check the air purity with just a glance

The device can be taken to other areas of the house to check the AQI. This mode displays air quality but doesn’t allow control of the air purifier.

Long live the wireless charger

The filter comes with wireless charger which is designed to keep going more than a year on a standard battery you can easily replace.

Complete control, at your fingertips

The Havells app lets you monitor and control your air purifier. So you can understand and adjust the conditions in your home, from wherever you are.

There is more to our Meditate Air Purifier
